description:
There is a party at Sir Loin-Stake’s mansion, and Team Chup are the  guests of honor. Captain Mussel intends to honor the team’s recent crime-solving savvy; however, a mysterious letter dampens the mood. Apparently, dark magic will overrun the mansion at the strike of twelve. Suddenly, the festivities spiral into a frantic, finger-pointing, seemingly fruitless search for the suspect.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Saraba Chili Pepper: Saigo no Jiken
さらばチリペッパー 最後の事件
